code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import ReactMarkdown from'react-markdown';import'./Blog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogPost=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const{postId}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[post,setPost]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPost=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(`/blogs/${postId}.md`);const content=await response.text();const metadataResponse=await fetch('/blogs/index.json');const posts=await metadataResponse.json();const postData=posts.find(p=>p.id===postId);if(postData){setPost({...postData,content});}else{navigate('/blogs');}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching blog post:',error);navigate('/blogs');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchPost();},[postId,navigate]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-loading",children:"Loading blog post..."})});}if(!post){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-date",children:post.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactMarkdown,{children:post.content})})]})})]});};export default BlogPost;
